mapper.insert: insert into shop ( sh_idx, sh_title, sh_name, sh_category, sh_categoryDetail, sh_content, sh_ea, sh_price, sh_img1, sh_img2, sh_saleprice, sh_salepercent, sh_seller ) values ( shop_idx_seq.nextval, #{sh_title}, #{sh_name}, #{sh_category}, #{sh_categoryDetail}, #{sh_content}, #{sh_ea}, #{sh_price}, #{sh_img1}, #{sh_img2}, #{sh_salePrice}, #{sh_salePercent}, #{sh_seller} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from shop where SH_CATEGORYDETAIL like '%'||#{categoryDetail}||'%'
mapper.update: update shop set sh_hit = sh_hit + 1 WHERE SH_IDX = #{sh_idx}
